channel.title: lnmp on listenlive.cn
channel.description: Recent content in lnmp on listenlive.cn

item.title: Ubuntu搭建LNMP环境
item.description: 安装Nginx sudo apt install nginx 安装MySQL sudo apt install mysql-server-5.7 安装PHP sudo apt install php7.2 sudo apt install php-fpm7.2 安装PHP扩展 sudo apt install php7.2-xml php7.2-mysql php7.2-curl 设置MySQL用户名密码 #查看初始用户名和密
